org.mxupdate.eclipse.importwizard
Class Step2ConfigurationItemsPage

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.DialogPage
      org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardPage
          org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.WizardDataTransferPage
              org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.WizardResourceImportPage
                  org.mxupdate.eclipse.importwizard.Step2ConfigurationItemsPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IDialogPage, org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IMessageProvider, org.eclipse.jface.wizard.IWizardPage, org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Listener, org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.IOverwriteQuery
public class Step2ConfigurationItemsPage
extends org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.WizardResourceImportPage

Second step of the import wizard for configuration items. On the page first a folder selection is shown where the imported configuration items will be created. Then a table with all found configuration items are shown. The configuration which are imported must be selected within this table.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean _visible)
If this page is shown the search for configuration items is performed depending on the defined values from the first step of the wizard.

Specified by:

Parameters:

createControl

public void createControl(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite _parent)
Creates the control for the second step of the wizard. The original method is overwritten so that the destination group is shown above the source group.

Specified by:
createControl in interface org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IDialogPage

validateSourceGroup

protected boolean validateSourceGroup()
Checks if at minimum one configuration item from table is selected. If not an error message is shown.

Overrides:
validateSourceGroup in class org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.WizardDataTransferPage
Returns:
true if at minimum on configuration item is selected; otherwise false
